price: And He has created the livestock for you as a source of warmth and other benefits[4], and from them you eat.
arabic: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: [4] i.e., in clothing, tents, furnishings, etc.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
